content.title: Weekly stretch goal : The Bounty Hunter Set is now unlocked !
content.creator:
STL Fun Forge
February 17, 2025
content.content:
Hello everyone, 
a new kind of stretch goal is here : weekly stretch goal :) We start this with the Bounty Hunter Set ! Now you can get a lot of stuff for your collection or your cosplay ! Credit, grenades, knife, com device and a blaster! 
This is the 11th unlocked stretch goal and added to your pledge :) 18 new extra parts ! You can get 440+ STL with the offer! 
But that's not all ! Almost 100 backers are supporting this project and we are close to unlock the next stretch goal to expand your collection even more!
Thank you in advance for your support and have a really fun day :)
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/297230388/modular-stl-sabers-neopixel-compatible

content.title: Dummy Blade and Xeno Baselite
content.creator:
STL Fun Forge
February 12, 2025
content.content:
Hello everyone, 
I've just unlocked a special community Stretch goal : dummy blade ! 
If you just want a display saber with a blade, print this custom dummy blade and add it to your creations for a cool result.
If you want to use the Baselite Xeno instead of the Neopixel, you can print the dummy blade (if you don't want to buy the official blade) in translucent to make a lightning saber!
Now it's 8 unlocked stretch goals in only 24 hours ! 400 STL parts for more and more new creations. 
Thank you for your amazing support and have a really fun printing day :)

content.title: Add-ons are now available !
content.creator:
STL Fun Forge
February 12, 2025
content.content:
Hello everyone,
The campaign is now live and 7 stretch goals are now unlocked, which is almost 395 STL parts!
Many of you have asked me how to get the previous campaigns, it is now possible! Select the campaign you want before validating your commitment.
If you have already validated your pledge, simply click "modify my pledge" and select add-ons you want :)
Thank you very much for your amazing support and have a nice printing day !
